step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow straighter for maximum resistance.
Your fist was tight, but try to open your hand wider and extend your fingers more.
You're doing great with the fist and tightening your muscles. Focus on a wider hand opening during the exhale.
Excellent! Your hand opening and muscle relaxation were very good this time. Keep up the great work.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and make a tight fist while breathing in. Then, open your hand wide as you breathe out.
